title: How beneficial is having an iPad and Apple Pencil for studying? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not that much. In terms of studying or learning, tool is rarely a game-changer. You can use an old computer to watch videos. A paper and pencil to draw, doodle, or write. Go to library to read some stuffs. Anything, literally. As long as you’re thirsty enough to learn, tool is just a tool. Your motivation and creativity will find a way. Sure, using an iPad and Apple Pencil will saves you some time, abling you to use some amazing Learning Apps, makes it more interesting and comfortable. But it’s not that important. The most amazing minds I know often have some serious limitation or even learning challenger. Yet they still find a way to strive.
